p: According to the frequency analysis, association rule analysis and molecular docking results of high-frequency CMs, Gancao (Glycyrrhizae Radix Et Rhizoma) and HuangQin (Scutellariae Radix) were the key medicines pairs of these prescriptions for treatment of COVID-19. A systemic pharmacology model based on chemical, pharmacokinetic and pharmacological data was constructed to explore the molecular mechanisms.
